End time : 16/05/2023 10:24 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our product security management for you and your visitors, we will remove TLS versions 1.0 and TLS 1.1 from our web hosting and CDN services. This will leave only TLS 1.2 and TLS 1.3 versions active, which have been deemed compliant by CNIL in terms of data security.
No action is required from you â€” neither on your Web Hosting plan, nor on your CDN.
We will update this task during the proposed timeline.
